Class AbstractLexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.surveyman.input.AbstractLexer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CSVLexer

    public abstract class AbstractLexer
extends Object
    This class implements general lexing utility methods.
